value.title: Download/ Export Power Query data to csv, excel or txt - Power BI Tips & Tricks #25
value.excerpt: Do you want to export your power query data? In this video I show you how to do it :)  How to install R: https://goo.gl/g4wbEm BI accountant blog: https://goo.gl/lnjjxM Link to Power BI file: https://gofile.me/2kEOD/YPnFQZQ4c  R script: require(gdata) write.table(trim(dataset), file=”C:/writeyourfilepathhere/filename.txt”,

value.title: Explain the different types of join/merge available in Power BI/ Excel
value.excerpt: Confused with all the join/ merge types options available in Power BI Desktop? No  worries, we explain all types in detail here. value.title: Get Power BI data in Excel without Pivot Tables | Excel Data Types

Let me show you how in today's video!  Here you can download all

value.title: How to create hierarchies in Power Query
value.excerpt: If you want to create hierarchies in Power BI, you need to structure your data in a special way, so they get displayed as hierarchies in Power BI.  In todays video I will show you how to model your data in Power Query, so your hierarchies are displayed correcly.  Link to Advance fill down techniques:

value.title: Insert blank rows at each category in Power Query
value.excerpt: Have you ever wanted to have a blank row after each category or subcategory, so you can visualize your data in a table?   In this video I will show you how to add a blank row for each group using power query in one step!  Enjoy!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: 4 Troubleshooting connectivity tips with the gateway
value.excerpt: This video was based on a call I had last week relating to troubleshooting connectivity to a SQL Server named instance from the Power BI gateway. value.title: Best Practice Analyzer in Tabular Editor for your Power BI Dataset

value.title: Can you refresh a single table in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Frustrated that a you can only do a full refresh? Patrick takes it to the next level by showing how you can refresh only a single table in your Power BI dataset. This is a great option for targeted refresh and avoid potential overhead. value.title: Enable QUERY FOLDING for native queries in Power Query / Power BI

Chris Webb Blog: https://blog.crossjoin.co.uk/2021/02/21/query-folding-on-sql-queries-in-power-query-using-value-nativequery-and-enablefoldingtrue/
